title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after import
description: When trying to import a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, it is expected that the new image is displayed instead of the original one.
SR:
1. Open the layout where the image is displayed.
2. Import the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
3. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
